USERS: CREATE TABLE USERS (ID INT PRIMARY KEY, NAME VARCHAR(100), EMAIL VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP);
ORDERS: CREATE TABLE ORDERS (ORDER_ID INT PRIMARY KEY, USER_ID INT, ORDER_DATE DATE, TOTAL DECIMAL(10, 2), FOREIGN KEY (USER_ID) REFERENCES USERS(ID));
PRODUCTS: CREATE TABLE PRODUCTS (PRODUCT_ID INT PRIMARY KEY, NAME VARCHAR(100), PRICE DECIMAL(10, 2), STOCK INT);
ORDER_ITEMS: CREATE TABLE ORDER_ITEMS (ORDER_ITEM_ID INT PRIMARY KEY, ORDER_ID INT, PRODUCT_ID INT, QUANTITY INT, FOREIGN KEY (ORDER_ID) REFERENCES ORDERS(ORDER_ID), FOREIGN KEY (PRODUCT_ID) REFERENCES PRODUCTS(PRODUCT_ID));
